Name: Max Agility Actions {2}/{0}
Tip: Do not perform more than {0} agility actions in total.

Name: Max Shots Fired {2}/{0}
Tip: Do not fire more than {0} shots from any kind of gun.

Name: No Assault Rifle Shots
Tip: Do not fire any shots using an assault rifle.

Name: No Body Dragging
Tip: Do not drag any NPC bodies. You may grab and box them, provided you do not move while holding onto them.

Name: No Body Shots
Tip: Do not shoot any NPC unless it is a headshot.

Name: No Climbing Drain Pipes
Tip: Don't climb any drain pipe. This includes vines - anything you can slide down like a pipe. Ladders are okay.

Name: No Crouch Running
Tip: Avoid running while crouched.

Name: No Crouch Movement
Tip: If you crouch, you must stay still.

Name: No Crouch Move in Trespassing
Tip: If you crouch while in trespassing, you must stay still.

Name: No Crowd Blending
Tip: Avoid becoming concealed in crowded areas.

Name: No Damage
Tip: Do not take damage, not even friendly fire.

Name: No Double Doors Opened
Tip: Do not open any double doors by hand.

Name: No Dropping Items
Tip: Do not drop any item from your hands or inventory. Placing them is fine.

Name: No Instinct
Tip: Go against your instincts and avoid using instinct.

Name: No Pistol Shots
Tip: Do not fire any shots using a pistol.

Name: No SMG Shots
Tip: Do not fire any shots using an SMG.

Name: No Shotgun Shots
Tip: Do not fire any shots using a shotgun.

Name: No Sniper Shots
Tip: Do not fire any shots using an SMG.

Name: No Reloading
Tip: Do not reload any weapon. Avoid leaving clips around the place as evidence.

Name: No Shots Fired
Tip: Do not fire any shots.

Name: No Suppressed Shots
Tip: Do not fire any shots using a silenced or subsonic firearm.

Name: No Throwing
Tip: Do not throw any item.

Name: No Vegetation Concealing
Tip: Avoid concealing yourself in foliage.

Name: Only Run Crouched
Tip: Do not run while standing upright, only run while crouching.
